title: Bachelor of Science - Organic Chemistry | Hunter College - City University of New York
description: • Synthesized and characterized theoretically significant molecules to expand our understanding of aromaticity.

title: MS and PhD - Pathobiology and Molecular Medicine | Columbia University Irving Medical Center
description:
• Characterized a novel role of the amyloid precursor protein (APP) in the pathogenesis of Alzheimer's disease.
  • Trained and supervised several undergraduate students.

title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow | Columbia University Irving Medical Center
description:
• Investigated the role of small Rho-GTPases in Alzheimer's disease, which have also been linked to various cancers.
  • Contributed to a bioinformatics project for a non-biased approach to identify Alzheimer's disease associated genes.
  • Generated and characterized transgenic mouse models to investigate the roles of several novel genes in driving Alzheimer's disease pathology.
  • Developed various gene editing tools (RNAi, viral vectors) to identify molecular pathways contributing to synaptic dysfunction.
  • Organized journal club sessions for graduate students.
  • Trained several undergraduate and master's students.

title: Principal Investigator | Columbia University Irving Medical Center
description:
• Led a translational research program focused on identifying novel biomarkers and druggable proteins involved in neurodegeneration.
  • Managed team and daily laboratory operations, including procuring and allocating resources to research projects, recruiting, training and supervising staff, and data management.
  • Designed experiments, reviewed, analyzed, and interpreted data, performed quality control, and managed records.
  • Established and maintained cross-functional institutional and international collaborations.
  • Conducted lectures and career development workshops.

title: Certificate - Data Analytics and Visualization | Columbia University School of Engineering
description:
• Acquired skills in ETL pipelines (Pandas, Numpy, SciPy, BeautifulSoup, Postgres, MongoDB), JavaScript, HTML/CSS.
  • Data visualization (Matplotlib, Plotly, Leaflet, D3, Tableau).
  • Machine Learning (Scikit-learn, TensorFlow).

title: Data Analyst Contractor | Insight Health Analytics
description:
• Performed quantitative analyses (PowerBI and R), developed mathematical business models, and conducted research on improving patient access to specialty pharmaceutical products; Data sources: IQVIA and internal client data.
  • Developed predictive sales and revenue forecast models for Market Access Strategy and Patient Support Services teams.
  • Designed visualizations and draft reports and presentations for senior management and key business partners.

title: Data Scientist | Analytics Intell
description:
• Collaborate with customer development and marketing teams, and various stakeholders to pinpoint opportunities for leveraging statistical modeling and machine learning techniques to optimize marketing strategies and drive customer engagement.
  • Lead, design, and implement marketing experiments, testing hypotheses to validate results and inform data-driven business strategies.
  • Identify essential data requirements, accessing both internal and external data sources to gather comprehensive datasets vital for in-depth analysis and insight generation.
  • Coordinate closely with data engineering teams to support efficient data collection, integration, and storage, ensuring seamless data availability for advanced analytics.
  • Draft and present detailed reports to monitor the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, providing crucial insights to guide marketing and reinvestment decisions.
  • Implement critical enhancements and fixes to decision systems and statistical models, continuously improving the accuracy and reliability of predictive models and decision-making tools.
  • Lead Gaming Industry Product(s) // (1) Implementation of unsupervised learning and Bayesian statistical models to maximize player reinvestment strategies; deployed as a web app (Python, SQLServer, AWS, Docker & Streamlit). (2) Application of linear programming to recommend optimal slot machine mix (Python).
